item.title: Serving static pages locally
item.description:
Running build-in tomcat server

It is possible to deploy Jekyll sites locally, because OSX has a build-in Apache tomcat server. The local sites reside under ~/Sites. However, the setup of this server often changes with new versions of OSX.
